<title level="1" pfs="">[Tino Tung (Level 13)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1483)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Tino Tung (Level 13)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1483)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 26</row>

**Perception** +23

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +22, [Irori Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +19, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [temple sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=61)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +20 

+1 status to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)
</row>

**HP** 240

**[Retributive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=31)** <actions string="Reaction" /> If Tino's Retributive Strike against the triggering creature doesn't critically miss, that creature meets the requirements for Tino to use Defiant Shove until the end of his next turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 45 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_fist_ +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d8+10 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_temple sword_ +24 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 fire

**Focus Spells** DC 30, 3 Focus Points
- **7th**
[Ki Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=484), [Ki Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=486), [Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395)

**Defiant Shove** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Tino used Retributive Strike on a creature since the start of his previous turn, attempted the Strike it permitted, and didn't critically miss; **Effect** Tino throws his whole body into a powerful push. He moves the target 5 feet in any direction and can then attempt to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) that creature. This is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451).

**Divine Smite**   If Tino hits with his Retributive Strike, the target takes 3 [persistent good damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

**Flurry of Blows** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) Tino makes two Strikes with his fist or with a [monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112) weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Powerful Fists**   Tino's fist Strikes don't take penalties when making lethal attacks.

</column>
name: Tino Tung (Level 13)

He moves the target 5 feet in any direction and can then attempt to Trip that creature. This is forced movement. Divine Smite If Tino hits with his Retributive Strike, the target takes 3 persistent good damage. Flurry of Blows Single Action (Flourish) Tino makes two Strikes with his fist or with a monk weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Powerful Fists Tino's fist Strikes don't take penalties when making lethal attacks.
